posts.text:
Bolt is a pure Go key/value store inspired by Howard Chuâ€™s LMDB project. The goal of the project is to provide a simple, fast, and reliable database for projects that donâ€™t require a full database server such as Postgres or MySQL. bolt æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„kvæ•°æ®åº“ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨åŠå…¶ç®€å•ï¼Œç›®å‰githubé¡¹ç›®å¤„äºåªè¯»çŠ¶æ€ã€‚ æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥123456789101112131415161718package mainimport ( "log" "github.com/boltdb/bolt")func main() { // æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œä¼šæ–°å»ºæ–‡ä»¶ db, err := bolt.Open("sai.db", 0600, nil) if err != nil { log.Fatal(err) } defer db.Close() ...} äº‹åŠ¡1234567891011// è¯»å†™err := db.Update(func(tx *bolt.Tx) error { ... return nil})// åªè¯»ï¼Œé‡Œé¢åªèƒ½è¿›è¡Œè¯»å–æ“ä½œerr := db.View(func(tx *bolt.Tx) error { ... return nil}) å¸¸ç”¨æ“ä½œ12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334// åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªbucketï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç†è§£æˆä¸€ä¸ªtableb, _ := tx.CreateBucketIfNotExists([]byte("sai0556"))// æ–°å¢b.Put([]byte("a"), []byte("11"))b.Put([]byte("b"), []byte("22"))// å–v := b.Get([]byte("a"))fmt.Printf("The a is: %s
", v)// åˆ é™¤b.Delete([]byte("a"))// æ¸¸æ ‡éå†/*First() Move to the first key.Last() Move to the last key.Seek() Move to a specific key.Next() Move to the next key.Prev() Move to the previous key*/c := b.Cursor()for k, v := c.First(); k != nil; k, v = c.Next() { fmt.Printf("key=%s, value=%s
", k, v)}// ForEach éå†b.ForEach(func(k, v []byte) error { fmt.Printf("key=%s, value=%s
", k, v) return nil})// åˆ é™¤buckettx.DeleteBucket([]byte("sai0556")) ä½¿ç”¨å¾ˆç®€å•ï¼Œä½†éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„ä»¥ä¸‹å‡ ç‚¹ï¼š åªè¯»Viewä¸­ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ç¼–è¾‘ã€åˆ é™¤ã€æ–°å¢ç­‰å†™æ“ä½œï¼Œä¼šäº§ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯ å› ä¸ºåº•å±‚ä½¿ç”¨äº†è¯»å†™é”ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œå†™æ“ä½œï¼Œè¦å°½å¯èƒ½å¿«ï¼Œæ›´ä¸è¦å¼€å¯é•¿äº‹åŠ¡ï¼Œä¼šé€ æˆé˜»å¡ï¼Œå½±å“æ€§èƒ½ æ›´å¤šè¯´æ˜å¯å‚è€ƒï¼š https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/boltdb/bolt@v1.3.1 https://github.com/boltdb/bolt

err != nil { // panic(err) // } //å»ºç«‹å¤šä¸ªnsqdè¿æ¥ if err := c.ConnectToNSQDs([]string{"127.0.0.1:4150"}); err != nil { panic(err) } <-ctx.Done() c.Stop() fmt.Println("consumer exit")}// å¤„ç†æ¶ˆæ¯func (*Consumer) HandleMessage(msg *nsq.Message) error { fmt.Println("receive", msg.NSQDAddress, "message:", string(msg.Body)) return nil} 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637// nsq_testpackage nsqimport ( "context" "os" "os/signal" "syscall" "testing" "time")func TestReceive(t *testing.T) { topic := "sai0556" ctx, cancel := context.WithCancel(context.Background()) defer cancel() go Send(ctx, cancel, topic) go Receive(ctx, cancel, topic) sig := make(chan os.Signal) signal.Notify(sig, syscall.SIGTERM, syscall.SIGINT) t.Log("å¼€å§‹ç›‘å¬") select { case <-ctx.Done(): t.Log("ctx done") return case <-sig: t.Log("signal exit...") cancel() time.Sleep(2 * time.Second) return } // send(topic)} æµ‹è¯•èµ°ä¸€æ³¢ï¼Œ å¯¹äºNSQï¼Œè‡ªå·±ä¹Ÿæ˜¯åˆšåˆšä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œç»™æˆ‘çš„æ„Ÿè§‰æ˜¯ç›¸å½“å¥½ä¸Šæ‰‹ï¼Œä¹‹å‰æœ‰ç”¨è¿‡RabbitMQï¼Œnsqç›¸æ¯”æ¥è¯´æ›´ç®€å•ï¼Œå¯èƒ½æ˜¯go-clientç›¸å¯¹å¥½ç”¨ä¸€äº›å§ã€‚åç»­æœ‰å…¶ä»–å€¼å¾—åˆ†äº«çš„ç‚¹å†ç»§ç»­è¡¥å……ã€‚å¦‚æœ‰éœ€è¦äº¤æµï¼Œå¯è”ç³»æˆ‘email/qqã€‚ å‚è€ƒ nsq

Raftåè®® raft.github.io/raft.pdf thesecretlivesofdata.com/raft/ www.cnblogs.com/MaggieLXC/pâ€¦ 3.1 Raftè§’è‰²Raftç®—æ³•æ˜¯Paxosç®—æ³•çš„ä¸€ç§ç®€åŒ–å®ç°ã€‚åŒ…æ‹¬ä¸‰ç§è§’è‰²ï¼šleaderï¼Œcandidateå’Œfollowerã€‚ follower: æ‰€æœ‰èŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½ä»¥followerçš„çŠ¶æ€å¼€å§‹ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰æ”¶åˆ°leaderæ¶ˆæ¯åˆ™ä¼šå˜æˆcandidateçŠ¶æ€ã€‚ candidate: ä¼šå‘å…¶ä»–èŠ‚ç‚¹æ‹‰é€‰ç¥¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœå¾—åˆ°å¤§éƒ¨åˆ†çš„ç¥¨åˆ™æˆä¸ºleaderï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªè¿‡ç¨‹æ˜¯Leaderé€‰ä¸¾ã€‚ leader: æ‰€æœ‰å¯¹ç³»ç»Ÿçš„ä¿®æ”¹éƒ½ä¼šå…ˆç»è¿‡leaderã€‚ 3.2 Raftç®—æ³•Raftæœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªåŸºæœ¬è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼š Leaderé€‰ä¸¾ï¼š æ¯ä¸ªcandidateéšæœºç»è¿‡ä¸€å®šæ—¶é—´éƒ½ä¼šæå‡ºé€‰ä¸¾æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œæœ€è¿‘é˜¶æ®µä¸­çš„ç¥¨æœ€å¤šè€…è¢«é€‰ä¸ºleaderã€‚ åŒæ­¥logï¼š leaderä¼šæ‰¾åˆ°ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­logï¼ˆå„ç§äº‹ä»¶çš„å‘ç”Ÿè®°å½•ï¼‰æœ€æ–°çš„è®°å½•ï¼Œå¹¶å¼ºåˆ¶æ‰€æœ‰çš„followæ¥åˆ·æ–°åˆ°è¿™ä¸ªè®°å½•ã€‚ Raftç®—æ³•è¿‡ç¨‹: æœ‰ä¸‰ç§çŠ¶æ€ï¼šleaderï¼Œcandidateå’Œfollowerã€‚ æœ€å¼€å§‹éƒ½æ˜¯followerçŠ¶æ€. followersæ²¡æœ‰å¬åˆ°leaderå°±å˜æˆcandidate candidate then requests votes from other nodes nodes will reply with their vote Candidate becomes the leader if it gets votes from a majority of nodes This process is called Leader Election. All changes to the system now go through the leader. Each change is added as an entry in the nodeâ€™s log. This log entry is currently uncommitted so it wonâ€™t update the nodeâ€™s value. To commit the entry the node first replicates it to the follower nodesâ€¦ then the leader waits until a majority of nodes have written the entry. The entry is now committed on the leader node and the node state is â€œ5â€. The leader then notifies the followers that the entry is committed. The cluster has now come to consensus about the system state. This process is called Log Replication. 3.2.1 Leader Election 3.2.2 Log Replication

posts.text: <?php/** * æ’åºç®—æ³•phpå®ç° */run();function run() { $array = [31, 54, 6, 15, 76, 8, 35, 3, 100, 31, 45]; //01 å†’æ³¡æ’åº $bubbleSortArray = bubbleSort($array); //02 æ’å…¥æ’åº $insertSortArray = insertSort($array); //03 é€‰æ‹©æ’åº $selectSortArray = selectSort($array); //04 å¸Œå°”æ’åº $shellSortArray = shellSort($array); //05 å †æ’åº $heapSortArray = heapSort($array); //06 å½’å¹¶æ’åº $mergeSortArray = mergeSort($array); //07 å¿«é€Ÿæ’åº $quickSortArray = quickSort($array); echo PHP_EOL."å†’æ³¡æ’åºï¼š"; var_export($bubbleSortArray); echo PHP_EOL."æ’å…¥æ’åºï¼š"; var_export($insertSortArray); echo PHP_EOL."é€‰æ‹©æ’åºï¼š"; echo PHP_EOL."å¿«é€Ÿæ’åºï¼š"; var_export($quickSortArray); return;}function bubbleSort($array) { /** * 01 å†’æ³¡æ’åº * è¯´æ˜ï¼šå°±æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®ä¸Šçš„æ•°ä¸ä»–ç›¸é‚»ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä½ç½®ä¸Šçš„æ•°æ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œ * å¦‚æœæ¯”ä»–ç›¸é‚»çš„æ•°å°ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸¤è€…äº¤æ¢ä½ç½®ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¸äº¤æ¢ã€‚ * æ¥ç€ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®ä¸Šçš„æ•°ä¸ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªä½ç½®ä¸Šçš„æ•°æ¯”è¾ƒå¤§å°ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯å°åˆ™äº¤æ¢ï¼Œ * ä¸€ç›´åˆ°å’Œæœ€åä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®çš„æ•°æ¯”è¾ƒäº¤æ¢å®Œæ¯•ã€‚ * ç„¶åï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå¾ªç¯ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªä½ç½®ä¸Šçš„æ•°é‡å¤ä¸Šé¢çš„æ¯”è¾ƒäº¤æ¢æ“ä½œï¼Œ * ç›´åˆ°æŠŠæ•´ä¸ªæ•°åˆ—å˜æˆæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä»å°åˆ°å¤§çš„æœ‰åºåºåˆ—ã€‚ */ $count = count($array); for ($i = 0; $i < $count; $i++) { for ($j=$i+1; $j<$count; $j++) { if ($array[$i] > $array[$j]) { list($array[$i], $array[$j]) = [$array[$j],$array[$i]]; } } } return $array;}function insertSort($array) { /** * 02 æ’å…¥æ’åº * è¯´æ˜ï¼šä»ä¸€å †å¾…æ’åºçš„æ•°åˆ—ä¸­é€‰å‡ºæ¥ä¸€ä¸ªæœ€å°å€¼(å¯ä»¥è®¤ä¸ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°å°±æ˜¯å·²æ’åºçš„æ•°åˆ—)ï¼Œ * ç„¶åä»å‰©ä½™çš„å¸¦æ’åºçš„æ•°åˆ—ä¸­é€‰å‡ºæ¥æœ€å°å€¼æœ‰åºæ”¾åˆ°å·²æ’åºçš„æ•°åˆ—ä¸­ï¼Œ * ä¾æ¬¡æ“ä½œï¼Œç›´åˆ°æœ€åçš„æ•°åˆ—éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä»å°åˆ°å¤§çš„æœ‰åºæ•°åˆ—ä¸ºæ­¢ */ $count = count($array); for ($i = 1; $i < $count; $i++) { $min = $i; //æ‹¿å‡ºå¾…æ’åºä¸­çš„æœ€å°å€¼ for ($j = $i + 1; $j < $count; $j++) { if ($array[$min] > $array[$j]) { $min = $j; } } //äº¤æ¢ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯ç›´æ¥èµ‹å€¼ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¼šæœ‰æ•°æ®ä¸¢å¤± swap($array[$i], $array[$min]); //æ‹¿å‡ºçš„å€¼æ’å…¥åˆ°å·²æ’åºçš„æ•°åˆ—ä¸­ for ($k=$i-1; $k>=0; $k--) { if ($array[$i] < $array[$k]) { swap($array[$i], $array[$k]); } break; } } return $array;}function selectSort($array) { /** * 03 é€‰æ‹©æ’åº * è¯´æ˜ï¼šä»ä¸€å †å¾…æ’åºçš„æ•°åˆ—ä¸­é€‰å‡ºæ¥ä¸€ä¸ªæœ€å°å€¼ï¼Œæ”¾åˆ°æ–°çš„æ•°ç»„çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®ï¼Œ * ç»§ç»­ä»å‰©ä½™çš„æ•°åˆ—ä¸­é€‰å–æœ€å°å€¼æ”¾å…¥åˆ°æ•°ç»„ä¸­ï¼Œé‡å¤ä¸Šé¢çš„æ­¥éª¤ï¼Œå°†æ•°å­—éƒ½å–å‡ºæ¥æ’æˆæ–°çš„æœ‰åºæ•°åˆ— */ $count = count($array); $newArr = array(); for ($i=0; $i< $count; $i++) { $min = selectSortChild($array); // var_dump($min); $newArr[$i] = $array[$min]; unset($array[$min]); //unsetåº•å±‚æºç åªæ˜¯å°†minå…ƒç´ æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘äº†nullï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦ä¸‹é¢çš„æ“ä½œï¼Œå¦åˆ™æ’åºç»“æœåå‡ é¡¹éƒ½æ˜¯NULL $array = array_merge($array, []); } return $newArr;}//é€‰æ‹©æ’åºå­å‡½æ•°function selectSortChild($array) { $count = count($array); $min = 0; //æ‹¿å‡ºå¸¦æ’åºä¸­çš„æœ€å°å€¼ for($j = 1; $j < $count; $j++) { if($array[$min] > $array[$j]) { $min = $j; } } return $min;}//04 å¸Œå°”æ’åºfunction shellSort($array) { /** * 04 å¸Œå°”æ’åº * è¯´æ˜ï¼šæ’å…¥æ’åºçš„ä¸€ç§æ”¹è¿›ï¼Œ * å…ˆæ¯”è¾ƒä¸€å®šè·ç¦»çš„å…ƒç´ æˆä¸ºæœ‰åºæ•°åˆ—ï¼Œå†æ¯”è¾ƒç¼©å°å¢é‡è·ç¦»çš„å…ƒç´ (å¯ä¸ºå…ƒç´ çš„æ•°é‡çš„ä¸€åŠ)ï¼Œ * ä¸€ç›´åˆ°æ¯”è¾ƒçš„æ˜¯ç›¸é‚»å…ƒç´ çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå°±æˆä¸ºäº†æ’å…¥æ’åºã€‚ */ //ä¸‰å±‚å¾ª $count = count($array); for ($loop = floor($count); $loop > 0; $loop = floor($loop/2)) { for ($i=$loop; $i<$count; $i++) { for ($j=$i-$loop; $j>=0 && $array[$j] > $array[$j+$loop]; $j = $j-$loop) { swap($array[$j], $array[$j+$loop]); } } } return $array;}//05 å †æ’åºfunction heapSort($array){ /** * 05 å †æ’åº è¯´æ˜ï¼š * 1) æ„é€ å¤§é¡¶å † * 2ï¼‰äº¤æ¢å †é¡¶å’Œå †åº• * 3)é‡å¤å‰é¢çš„æ­¥éª¤å‡åºæ’åˆ—å®Œæˆ */ $count = count($array); //1. æ„é€ å¤§é¡¶å † for ($i=floor($count/2) - 1; $i>=0; $i--) { adjustHeap($array, $i, $count); } //2. æ’åº for ($j=$count-1; $j>=0; $j--) { swap($array[0], $array[$j]); adjustHeap($array, 0, $j); } return $array;}//å †æ’åºå­å‡½æ•°function adjustHeap(&$array, $i, $length){ if($i<0) return false; $tmp = $array[$i]; for ($j=$i*2+1; $j<$length; $j=$j*2+1) { if ($j+1< $length && $array[$j] < $array[$j+1])//å³å­èŠ‚ç‚¹æ¯”å·¦å­èŠ‚ç‚¹å¤§ï¼Œåˆ™jæŒ‡å‘å³å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ $j++; if ($array[$j] > $tmp) { //å­èŠ‚ç‚¹æ¯”çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹å¤§ï¼Œåˆ™å°†å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å€¼èµ‹ç»™çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹(ä¸ç”¨äº¤æ¢) $array[$i] = $array[$j]; $i = $j; } else { break; } } $array[$i] = $tmp;//å®ç°äº¤æ¢(iæœ‰å˜åŒ–æ—¶)}//06 å½’å¹¶æ’åºfunction mergeSort($array) { /** * 06 å½’å¹¶æ’åº * è¯´æ˜ï¼šå°†å¾…æ’åºçš„æ•°åˆ—çœ‹æˆæ˜¯å•ä¸ªçš„æœ‰åºçš„æ•°åˆ—ï¼Œ * ç„¶åè¿›è¡Œåˆå¹¶ï¼Œç›´åˆ°åˆå¹¶æˆæœ€åçš„å®Œæ•´æœ‰åºçš„æ•°åˆ— */ //1.è¿›è¡Œå½’å¹¶ $length = count($array); for ($gap = 1; $gap<$length; $gap = $gap*2) { mergePass($array, $gap, $length); } return $array;}//å½’å¹¶æ’åºå­å‡½æ•°1--åˆå¹¶function mergePass (&$array, $gap, $length) { //1. å½’å¹¶é•¿åº¦æ˜¯gapçš„ç›¸é‚»ä¸¤ä¸ªå­è¡¨ for ($i=0; $i+2*$gap-1<$length; $i=$i+2*$gap) { merge($array, $i, $i+$gap-1, $i+2*$gap-1); } //2. ä½™ä¸‹çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªå­—è¡¨åˆå¹¶ï¼Œåè€…çš„é•¿åº¦å°äºgap if ($i+$gap-1 < $length) { merge($array, $i, $i+$gap-1, $length-1); }}//å½’å¹¶æ’åºå­å‡½æ•°2--åˆå¹¶ä¸¤ä¸ªæœ‰åºåºåˆ—function merge(&$array, $low, $mid, $high) { $i = $low;//ç¬¬ä¸€æ®µåºåˆ—çš„ä¸‹æ ‡ $j = $mid + 1;//ç¬¬äºŒæ®µåºåˆ—çš„ä¸‹æ ‡ $k = 0; $arrayNew = array();//æ–°çš„ä¸´æ—¶åˆå¹¶æ•°ç»„ //æ‰«æç¬¬ä¸€æ®µåºåˆ—å’Œç¬¬äºŒæ®µåºåˆ—ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªåºåˆ—æ‰«æå®Œæ¯• while ($i<=$mid && $j<=$high) { //æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªåˆå¹¶çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå°çš„æ”¾åˆ°æ–°çš„ä¸´æ—¶åˆå¹¶æ•°ç»„ä¸­ if ($array[$i] > $array[$j]) { $arrayNew[$k] = $array[$j]; $k++; $j++; } else { $arrayNew[$k] = $array[$i]; $k++; $i++; } } //æ•°ç»„1ä¸­æœ‰æ²¡æ‰«æçš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œç›´æ¥å¤åˆ¶åˆ°æ–°æ•°ç»„ä¸­ while ($i <= $mid) { $arrayNew[$k] = $array[$i]; $k++; $i++; } //æ•°ç»„2ä¸­æœ‰æ²¡æ‰«æçš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œç›´æ¥å¤åˆ¶åˆ°æ–°æ•°ç»„ä¸­ while ($j <= $high) { $arrayNew[$k] = $array[$j]; $k++; $j++; } //å°†åˆå¹¶æ–°æ•°ç»„å¤åˆ¶åˆ°åŸæ•°ç»„ä¸­ for ($i=$low,$k=0; $i<=$high; $i++,$k++) { $array[$i] = $arrayNew[$k]; }}//äº¤æ¢æ•°æ®function swap (&$a, &$b) { $res = $a; $a = $b; $b = $res;}function quickSort($array) { // åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦è¿è¡Œï¼Œå› ä¸‹é¢å·²æ‹¿å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªä¸­é—´å€¼ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œ<=1 if (count($array) <= 1) { return $array; } $middle = $array[0]; // ä¸­é—´å€¼ $left = []; // æ¥æ”¶å°äºä¸­é—´å€¼ $right = [];// æ¥æ”¶å¤§äºä¸­é—´å€¼ $equal = []; $equal[] = $middle; // å¾ªç¯æ¯”è¾ƒ for ($i=1; $i < count($array); $i++) { if ($middle == $array[$i]) { $equal[] = $array[$i]; } elseif ($middle < $array[$i]) { $right[] = $array[$i]; } else { $left[] = $array[$i]; } } // é€’å½’æ’åºåˆ’åˆ†å¥½çš„2è¾¹ $left = quickSort($left); $right = quickSort($right); // åˆå¹¶æ’åºåçš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œåˆ«å¿˜äº†åˆå¹¶ä¸­é—´å€¼ return array_merge($left, $equal, $right);}

posts.text: æˆ‘ä»¬éƒ½çŸ¥é“æŸ¥æ‰¾Redisçš„é”®æ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨keys patternï¼Œä½†å½“keyå¤ªå¤šæ—¶ï¼Œkeyså‘½ä»¤çš„æ•ˆç‡å°±å¾ˆä½ï¼Œå¦‚æœåœ¨çº¿ä¸Šç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œç”šè‡³å¯èƒ½å‘ç”Ÿç”Ÿäº§äº‹æ•…ï¼Œè¿™æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸å¦¨ä½¿ç”¨scanå‘½ä»¤ã€‚ SCAN å‘½ä»¤æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºæ¸¸æ ‡çš„è¿­ä»£å™¨ï¼ˆcursor based iteratorï¼‰ï¼š SCAN å‘½ä»¤æ¯æ¬¡è¢«è°ƒç”¨ä¹‹åï¼Œ éƒ½ä¼šå‘ç”¨æˆ·è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„æ¸¸æ ‡ï¼Œ ç”¨æˆ·åœ¨ä¸‹æ¬¡è¿­ä»£æ—¶éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨è¿™ä¸ªæ–°æ¸¸æ ‡ä½œä¸º SCAN å‘½ä»¤çš„æ¸¸æ ‡å‚æ•°ï¼Œ ä»¥æ­¤æ¥å»¶ç»­ä¹‹å‰çš„è¿­ä»£è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚å½“ SCAN å‘½ä»¤çš„æ¸¸æ ‡å‚æ•°è¢«è®¾ç½®ä¸º 0 æ—¶ï¼Œ æœåŠ¡å™¨å°†å¼€å§‹ä¸€æ¬¡æ–°çš„è¿­ä»£ï¼Œ è€Œå½“æœåŠ¡å™¨å‘ç”¨æˆ·è¿”å›å€¼ä¸º 0 çš„æ¸¸æ ‡æ—¶ï¼Œ è¡¨ç¤ºè¿­ä»£å·²ç»“æŸã€‚ ç”Ÿæˆkey12345678910111213141516171819<?php// ç”Ÿæˆ1000ä¸ª$redis = new \Redis();$redis->connect('127.0.0.1', 6379, 10);$redis->select(2);$arr = [ 'rwer', '24erw', 'rterq4', 'sdgfd5', 'dgsdg', 'sfst',];for ($i=0; $i<1000; $i++) { $redis->set(md5($i.$arr[$i%6]), md5($arr[$i%6].'sdfsd'));}echo "OK".PHP_EOL; keysæŸ¥çœ‹ä¸ªæ•°keys c* scanéå†1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526<?php$redis = new \Redis();$redis->connect('127.0.0.1', 6379, 10);$redis->select(2);$iterator = null;// éå†å‰ç¼€$pattern = 'c*';$count = 100;// åŠ¡å¿…è®¾ç½®ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ²¡æ‰«æåˆ°ï¼Œç»§ç»­æ‰«æï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯è¿”å›ç©ºï¼Œå¦åˆ™whileç›´æ¥é€€å‡ºï¼Œéå†å°±ä¼šä¸å‡†ç¡®$redis->setOption(\Redis::OPT_SCAN, \Redis::SCAN_RETRY);$total = [];$i = 0;// $countå¯ä»¥ä¸è®¾ç½®ï¼Œéå¿…éœ€å‚æ•°while($arr = $redis->scan($iterator, $pattern, $count)) { $arrVal = $redis->mget($arr); $ret = array_combine($arr, $arrVal); $total = array_merge($total, $ret); $i++;}// var_dump($total);var_dump($i);echo count($total).PHP_EOL; å½“ç„¶ä½ ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¸ä½¿ç”¨\Redis::OPT_SCAN, \Redis::SCAN_RETRYè¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼Œè‡ªè¡Œå¾ªç¯ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­è¿”å›å€¼æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯falseï¼Œä¹Ÿèƒ½éå†æˆåŠŸã€‚

posts.text: æµ‹è¯•ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯Laravel5.5ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚ å®‰è£…1composer require tymon/jwt-auth=1.0.0-rc.5 é…ç½®ç”Ÿæˆé…ç½®123php artisan vendor:publish --provider="Tymon\JWTAuth\Providers\LaravelServiceProvider"php artisan jwt:secret authé…ç½®123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233<?phpreturn [ ... 'defaults' => [ 'guard' => 'web', 'passwords' => 'users', ], 'guards' => [ 'web' => [ 'driver' => 'session', 'provider' => 'users', ], // ä½¿ç”¨jwt 'api' => [ 'driver' => 'jwt', 'provider' => 'apiUser', ], ], 'providers' => [ ... // æŒ‡å®šmodel 'apiUser' => [ 'driver' => 'eloquent', 'model' => App\ApiUser::class, ], ],]; ç¼–ç æ§åˆ¶å™¨ï¼š 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293<?phpnamespace App\Http\Controllers\Api;use App\ApiUser;use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;use Illuminate\Http\Request;use Tymon\JWTAuth\Facades\JWTAuth;class AuthController extends Controller{ /** * ä¸­é—´ä»¶å»é™¤loginå’Œrefresh * * @return void */ public function __construct() { $this->middleware('auth:api', ['except' => ['login','refresh']]); } /** * Get a JWT via given credentials. * * @return \Illuminate\Http\JsonResponse */ public function login(Request $request) { $credentials = $request->only('phone', 'password'); if (count($credentials) < 2) { return response()->json(['error' => 'Unauthorized'], 401); } $user = ApiUser::where('phone', $credentials['phone']) ->where('password', md5($credentials['password'])) ->first(); if (empty($user) || !$token = JWTAuth::fromUser($user)) { return response()->json(['error' => 'Unauthorized'], 401); }} è·¯ç”±ï¼š æ­¤å¤„æ³¨æ„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¸ºäº†æ–¹ä¾¿æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨äº†getæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œç”Ÿäº§ç¯å¢ƒä¸å»ºè®®ä½¿ç”¨getã€‚ 12345678// routes/api.phpRoute::middleware('api')->prefix('auth')->namespace('Api')->group(function () { Route::get('login', 'AuthController@login'); Route::post('logout', 'AuthController@logout'); Route::get('refresh', 'AuthController@refresh'); Route::get('me', 'AuthController@me');}); æµ‹è¯•ä¸€ä¸‹: unauthenticatedå¤„ç†è¿™é‡Œéœ€è¦æ³¨æ„ä¸‹ï¼Œunauthenticatedå¤„ç†ä¸€ä¸‹æ¯”è¾ƒå¥½ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¼šé»˜è®¤è·³è½¬loginç™»å½•é¡µé¢ã€‚ 12345678910111213141516171819202122<?phpnamespace App\Exceptions;use Exception;use Illuminate\Foundation\Exceptions\Handler as ExceptionHandler;use Illuminate\Auth\AuthenticationException;class Handler extends ExceptionHandler{ ... protected function unauthenticated($request, AuthenticationException $exception) { return response()->json(['message' => 'Unauthenticated.'], 401); /*éapiå¯ä»¥è¿™ä¹ˆå¤„ç† return $request->expectsJson() ? response()->json(['message' => 'Unauthenticated.'], 401) : redirect()->guest(route('login')); */ }} åŠ å…¥token refreshåŠ å…¥ä¸­é—´ä»¶ä»£ç ï¼š 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940<?phpnamespace App\Http\Middleware; } catch (\Exception $exception) { throw new AuthenticationException('Unauthorized', []); } }} æ³¨å†Œï¼š 123456789101112131415161718<?phpnamespace App\Http;use Illuminate\Foundation\Http\Kernel as HttpKernel;class Kernel extends HttpKernel{ ... protected $routeMiddleware = [ 'token.refresh' => \App\Http\Middleware\RefreshToken::class, 'auth.basic' => \Illuminate\Auth\Middleware\AuthenticateWithBasicAuth::class, 'bindings' => \Illuminate\Routing\Middleware\SubstituteBindings::class, 'can' => \Illuminate\Auth\Middleware\Authorize::class, 'guest' => \App\Http\Middleware\RedirectIfAuthenticated::class, 'throttle' => \Illuminate\Routing\Middleware\ThrottleRequests::class, ];} ç›¸åº”çš„æ§åˆ¶å™¨æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ä¿®æ”¹ï¼š 1234public function __construct(){ $this->middleware('token.refresh', ['except' => ['login','refresh']]);} æŠŠtokenæ—¶é—´è®¾ç½®æˆ1åˆ†é’Ÿï¼Œæµ‹è¯•ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚ å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®apiè¿”å›ï¼Œå»è°ƒç”¨åˆ·æ–°æ¥å£ã€‚ ç®€å•ä½¿ç”¨å°±æ˜¯è¿™æ ·å•¦ã€‚æ›´å¤šä½¿ç”¨å¯ä»¥çœ‹ä¸‹ç«™å†…å…¶ä»–æ–‡ç« ï¼šJWT å®Œæ•´ä½¿ç”¨è¯¦è§£jwt-authæ–‡æ¡£

let imgType = file.file.type.split("/")[1].toLowerCase(); if (imgType != 'jpg' && imgType != 'png') { this.$message.error('è¯·ä¸Šä¼ å›¾ç‰‡ç±»å‹'); return; } getOSSToken().then(function(res){ _self.aliyunOssToken = res.data; var ossData = {}; //keyå°±ä»£è¡¨æ–‡ä»¶å±‚çº§å’Œé˜¿é‡Œäº‘ä¸Šçš„æ–‡ä»¶å let imgType = file.file.type.split("/")[1]; let filename = file.file.name + file.file.size; //md5å¯¹å›¾ç‰‡åç§°è¿›è¡ŒåŠ å¯† let keyValue = "images/" + md5(new Date() + filename) + "." + imgType; } for ($i = $start; $i <= $limit; $i += $step) { yield $i; } } else { if ($step >= 0) { throw new LogicException('Step must be -ve'); } for ($i = $start; $i >= $limit; $i += $step) { yield $i; } }}/* * æ³¨æ„ä¸‹é¢range()å’Œxrange()è¾“å‡ºçš„ç»“æœæ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ã€‚ */echo 'Single digit odd numbers from range(): ';foreach (range(1, 9, 2) as $number) { echo "$number ";}echo "\n";echo 'Single digit odd numbers from xrange(): ';foreach (xrange(1, 9, 2) as $number) { echo "$number ";}// è¾“å‡ºå†…å®¹Single digit odd numbers from range(): 1 3 5 7 9Single digit odd numbers from xrange(): 1 3 5 7 9 é›†åˆlaravelä¸ä¸šåŠ¡ï¼ˆæ›´æ–°uvï¼‰çš„ä¾‹å­ï¼š 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108<?php/** * æ•°æ®ä¿®å¤ * Author: sai * Date: 2019/9/19 */namespace App\Console\Commands;use App\Models\StatisticModel;use Illuminate\Console\Command;use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Redis;class DataStatistic extends Command{ /** * The name and signature of the console command. * * @var string */ protected $signature = 'DataStatistic'; /** * The console command description. * * @var string */ protected $description = 'DataStatistic'; /** * Create a new command instance. * * @return void */ public function __construct() { parent::__construct(); } public function parseStr(...$param){ $str = ''; foreach ($param as $key => $value) { //å¤„ç†æ•°ç»„ if (is_array($value)) { $value = md5(json_encode($value)); } $str .= $value; } return $str; } public function handle() { // å•ç‹¬è¾“å‡ºåˆ°updateChapter.logæ–‡ä»¶ \Log::useFiles(storage_path().'/logs/data.log'); $iTime = time(); \Log::info('start', ['timestamp' => $iTime]); $i = 0; $ret = $this->traverse(); foreach ($ret as $v) { foreach ($v as $value) { $key = $this->parseStr('wx:', $value->wx_id); $count = (int) Redis::pfcount($key); // redisé‡Œçš„uvæ›´å¤§æ—¶æ›´æ–°ï¼Œå¹¶è®°å½•æ›´æ–°å‰åæ•°æ® if ($count > $value->uv) { \Log::info('update id:'.$value->id, [$value->uv => $count]); $i++; (new StatisticModel(['hash_id' => $value->wx_id]))->where('id', $value->id)->update(['uv' => $count, 'update_time' => $iTime]); } } } // è®°å½•æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ä¸æ•°é‡ \Log::info('end', ['timestamp'=>time(), 'count' => $i,'interval' => time() - $iTime]); return true; } private function traverse() { $page = 3000; for ($i = 1; $i < 6; $i++) { $count = DB::table('wx_statistics_'.$i)->count(); if ($count < 1) { // è®°å½•è¿›åº¦ \Log::info('update schedule', ['table success' => $i]); continue; } $num = ceil($count/$page); for ($j = 0; $j < $num; $j++) { $ret = DB::table('wx_statistics_'.$i) ->select(['id', 'wx_id', 'uv']) ->orderBy('id', 'asc') ->skip($j*$page) ->take($page) ->get() ->toArray(); if (empty($ret)) { continue; } yield $ret; } \Log::info('update schedule', ['table success' => $i]); } return true; }}

é“¾è¡¨æ“ä½œ$redis->delete('list-key'); // åˆ é™¤é“¾è¡¨$redis->lPush('list-key', 'A'); //æ’å…¥é“¾è¡¨å¤´éƒ¨/å·¦ä¾§ï¼Œè¿”å›é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦$redis->rPush('list-key', 'B'); //æ’å…¥é“¾è¡¨å°¾éƒ¨/å³ä¾§ï¼Œè¿”å›é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦$redis->lPushx('list-key', 'C');                  // æ’å…¥é“¾è¡¨å¤´éƒ¨/å·¦ä¾§,é“¾è¡¨ä¸å­˜åœ¨è¿”å›0ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨å³æ’å…¥æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›å½“å‰é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦$redis->rPushx('list-key', 'C');                  // æ’å…¥é“¾è¡¨å°¾éƒ¨/å³ä¾§,é“¾è¡¨ä¸å­˜åœ¨è¿”å›0ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨å³æ’å…¥æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿”å›å½“å‰é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦$redis->lPop('list-key'); //è¿”å›LISTé¡¶éƒ¨ï¼ˆå·¦ä¾§ï¼‰çš„VALUE ,åå…¥å…ˆå‡º(æ ˆ)$redis->rPop('list-key'); //è¿”å›LISTå°¾éƒ¨ï¼ˆå³ä¾§ï¼‰çš„VALUE ,å…ˆå…¥å…ˆå‡ºï¼ˆé˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼‰$redis->blPop();$redis->brPop();$redis->lSize('list-key');                     // å¦‚æœæ˜¯é“¾è¡¨åˆ™è¿”å›é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ï¼Œç©ºé“¾è¡¨è¿”å›0                        è‹¥ä¸æ˜¯é“¾è¡¨æˆ–è€…ä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›false ,åˆ¤æ–­éé“¾è¡¨ " === false "                          $redis->lGet('list-key',-1); // é€šè¿‡ç´¢å¼•è·å–é“¾è¡¨å…ƒç´  0è·å–å·¦ä¾§ä¸€ä¸ª  -1è·å–æœ€åä¸€ä¸ª$redis->lSet('list-key', 0, 'X'); //0ä½ç½®å…ƒç´ æ›¿æ¢ä¸º X$redis->lRange('list-key', 0, 3);                     //é“¾è¡¨æˆªå– ä»0å¼€å§‹ 3ä½ç½®ç»“æŸ ï¼Œç»“æŸä½ç½®ä¸º-1 è·å–å¼€å§‹ä½ç½®ä¹‹åçš„å…¨éƒ¨$redis->lTrim('list-key', 0, 1); // æˆªå–é“¾è¡¨(ä¸å¯é€†) ä»0ç´¢å¼•å¼€å§‹ 1ç´¢å¼•ç»“æŸ $redis->lRem('list-key', 'C', 2); //é“¾è¡¨ä»å·¦å¼€å§‹åˆ é™¤å…ƒç´ 2ä¸ªC$redis->lInsert('list-key', Redis::BEFORE, 'C', 'X');                     // åœ¨Cå…ƒç´ å‰é¢æ’å…¥X  , Redis::AfTER(è¡¨ç¤ºåé¢æ’å…¥)                        é“¾è¡¨ä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™æ’å…¥å¤±è´¥ è¿”å›0 è‹¥å…ƒç´ ä¸å­˜åœ¨è¿”å›-1$redis->rpoplpush('list-key', 'list-key2');                     //ä»æºLISTçš„æœ€åå¼¹å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´                       å¹¶ä¸”æŠŠè¿™ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä»ç›®æ ‡LISTçš„é¡¶éƒ¨ï¼ˆå·¦ä¾§ï¼‰å‹å…¥ç›®æ ‡LISTã€‚ $redis->brpoplpush();                    //rpoplpushçš„é˜»å¡ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªç‰ˆæœ¬æœ‰ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•°ç”¨äºè®¾ç½®é˜»å¡æ—¶é—´                      å³å¦‚æœæºLISTä¸ºç©ºï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå¯ä»¥é˜»å¡ç›‘å¬timeoutçš„æ—¶é—´ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰å…ƒç´ äº†åˆ™æ‰§è¡Œæ“ä½œã€‚4. æ— åºç±»å‹setæ— åºé›†åˆ ä¸å…è®¸å‡ºç°é‡å¤çš„å…ƒç´  æœåŠ¡ç«¯å¯ä»¥å®ç°å¤šä¸ª é›†åˆæ“ä½œ$redis->sMembers('key'); //è·å–å®¹å™¨keyä¸­æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ $redis->sAdd('key' , 'TK');                 // (ä»å·¦ä¾§æ’å…¥,æœ€åæ’å…¥çš„å…ƒç´ åœ¨0ä½ç½®),é›†åˆä¸­å·²ç»å­˜åœ¨TK åˆ™è¿”å›false                      ä¸å­˜åœ¨æ·»åŠ æˆåŠŸ è¿”å›true$redis->sRem('key' , 'TK'); // ç§»é™¤å®¹å™¨ä¸­çš„TK$redis->sMove('key','key1','TK'); //å°†å®¹æ˜“keyä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ TK ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°å®¹å™¨key1  æ“ä½œæˆåŠŸè¿”å›TRUE$redis->sIsMember('key','TK'); //æ£€æŸ¥VALUEæ˜¯å¦æ˜¯SETå®¹å™¨ä¸­çš„æˆå‘˜$redis->sCard('key'); //è¿”å›SETå®¹å™¨çš„æˆå‘˜æ•°$redis->sPop('key'); //éšæœºè¿”å›å®¹å™¨ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œå¹¶ç§»é™¤è¯¥å…ƒç´ $redis->sRandMember('key');//éšæœºè¿”å›å®¹å™¨ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œä¸ç§»é™¤è¯¥å…ƒç´ $redis->sInter('key','key1');      // è¿”å›ä¸¤ä¸ªé›†åˆçš„äº¤é›† æ²¡æœ‰äº¤é›†è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºæ•°ç»„ï¼Œè‹¥å‚æ•°åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªé›†åˆï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›é›†åˆå¯¹åº”çš„å®Œæ•´çš„æ•°ç»„$redis->sInterStore('store','key','key1'); //å°†é›†åˆkeyå’Œé›†åˆkey1çš„äº¤é›† å­˜å…¥å®¹å™¨store æˆåŠŸè¿”å›1$redis->sUnion('key','key1'); //é›†åˆkeyå’Œé›†åˆkey1çš„å¹¶é›†  æ³¨æ„å³ä½¿å¤šä¸ªé›†åˆæœ‰ç›¸åŒå…ƒç´  åªä¿ç•™ä¸€ä¸ª$redis->sUnionStore('store','key','key1');             //é›†åˆkeyå’Œé›†åˆkey1çš„å¹¶é›†ä¿å­˜åœ¨é›†åˆstoreä¸­,  æ³¨æ„å³ä½¿å¤šä¸ªé›†åˆæœ‰ç›¸åŒå…ƒç´  åªä¿ç•™ä¸€ä¸ª$redis->sDiff('key','key1','key2'); //è¿”å›æ•°ç»„ï¼Œè¯¥æ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ æ˜¯å­˜åœ¨äºkeyé›†åˆè€Œä¸å­˜åœ¨äºé›†åˆkey1 key25. Zsetæ•°æ®ç±»å‹(stored set) å’Œ set ä¸€æ ·æ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„é›†åˆï¼Œä¸åŒçš„æ˜¯æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ éƒ½ä¼šå…³è”ä¸€ä¸ª double ç±»å‹çš„ scoreredisçš„listç±»å‹å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ¯ä¸ªå­å…ƒç´ éƒ½æ˜¯stringç±»å‹çš„åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨ã€‚$redis->zAdd('tkey', 1, 'A');                            //  æ’å…¥é›†åˆtkeyä¸­ï¼ŒAå…ƒç´ å…³è”ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ†æ•°ï¼Œæ’å…¥æˆåŠŸè¿”å›1                               åŒæ—¶é›†åˆå…ƒç´ ä¸å¯ä»¥é‡å¤, å¦‚æœå…ƒç´ å·²ç»å­˜åœ¨è¿”å› 0$redis->zRange('tkey',0,-1); // è·å–é›†åˆå…ƒç´ ï¼Œä»0ä½ç½® åˆ° -1 ä½ç½®$redis->zRange('tkey',0,-1, true);                     // è·å–é›†åˆå…ƒç´ ï¼Œä»0ä½ç½® åˆ° -1 ä½ç½®, è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå…³è”æ•°ç»„ å¸¦åˆ†æ•°                       array([A] => 0.01,[B] => 0.02,[D] => 0.03) å…¶ä¸­å°æ•°æ¥è‡ªzAddæ–¹æ³•ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå‚æ•°$redis->zDelete('tkey', 'B'); // ç§»é™¤é›†åˆtkeyä¸­å…ƒç´ B  æˆåŠŸè¿”å›1 å¤±è´¥è¿”å› 0$redis->zRevRange('tkey', 0, -1); // è·å–é›†åˆå…ƒç´ ï¼Œä»0ä½ç½® åˆ° -1 ä½ç½®ï¼Œæ•°ç»„æŒ‰ç…§scoreé™åºå¤„ç†$redis->zRevRange('tkey', 0, -1,true);                 // è·å–é›†åˆå…ƒç´ ï¼Œä»0ä½ç½® åˆ° -1 ä½ç½®ï¼Œæ•°ç»„æŒ‰ç…§scoreé™åºå¤„ç† è¿”å›scoreå…³è”æ•°ç»„$redis->zRangeByScore('tkey', 0, 0.2,array('withscores' => true));             //è·å–å‡ ä¸ªtkeyä¸­scoreåœ¨åŒºé—´[0,0.2]å…ƒç´  ,scoreç”±ä½åˆ°é«˜æ’åº,                å…ƒç´ å…·æœ‰ç›¸åŒçš„scoreï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¼šæŒ‰ç…§å­—å…¸é¡ºåºæ’åˆ— , withscores æ§åˆ¶è¿”å›å…³è”æ•°ç»„$redis->zRangeByScore('tkey', 0.1, 0.36, array('withscores' => TRUE, 'limit' => array(0, 1)));             //å…¶ä¸­limitä¸­ 0å’Œ1 è¡¨ç¤ºå–ç¬¦åˆæ¡ä»¶é›†åˆä¸­ ä»0ä½ç½®å¼€å§‹ï¼Œå‘åæ‰«æ1ä¸ª è¿”å›å…³è”æ•°ç»„$redis->zCount('tkey', 2, 10); // è·å–tkeyä¸­scoreåœ¨åŒºé—´[2, 10]å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸ªæ•°$redis->zRemRangeByScore('tkey', 1, 3); // ç§»é™¤tkeyä¸­scoreåœ¨åŒºé—´1, 3çš„å…ƒç´ $redis->zRemRangeByRank('tkey', 0, 1);                          //é»˜è®¤å…ƒç´ scoreæ˜¯é€’å¢çš„ï¼Œç§»é™¤tkeyä¸­å…ƒç´  ä»0å¼€å§‹åˆ°-1ä½ç½®ç»“æŸ$redis->zSize('tkey');  //è¿”å›å­˜å‚¨åœ¨keyå¯¹åº”çš„æœ‰åºé›†åˆä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸ªæ•°$redis->zScore('tkey', 'A'); // è¿”å›é›†åˆtkeyä¸­å…ƒç´ Açš„scoreå€¼$redis->zRank('tkey', 'A');                       // è¿”å›é›†åˆtkeyä¸­å…ƒç´ Açš„ç´¢å¼•å€¼                          zé›†åˆä¸­å…ƒç´ æŒ‰ç…§scoreä»ä½åˆ°é«˜è¿›è¡Œæ’åˆ— ï¼Œå³æœ€ä½çš„score indexç´¢å¼•ä¸º0$redis->zIncrBy('tkey', 2.5, 'A'); // å°†é›†åˆtkeyä¸­å…ƒç´ Açš„scoreå€¼ åŠ  2.5$redis->zUnion('union', array('tkey', 'tkey1'));         // å°†é›†åˆtkeyå’Œé›†åˆtkey1å…ƒç´ åˆå¹¶äºé›†åˆunion , å¹¶ä¸”æ–°é›†åˆä¸­å…ƒç´ ä¸èƒ½é‡å¤           è¿”å›æ–°é›†åˆçš„å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œ å¦‚æœå…ƒç´ Aåœ¨tkeyå’Œtkey1éƒ½å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™åˆå¹¶åçš„å…ƒç´ Açš„scoreç›¸åŠ $redis->zUnion('ko2', array('k1', 'k2'), array(5, 2));         // é›†åˆk1å’Œé›†åˆk2å¹¶é›†äºk02 ï¼Œarray(5,1)ä¸­å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸ªæ•°ä¸å­é›†åˆå¯¹åº”ï¼Œç„¶å 5 å¯¹åº”k1            k1æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ scoreéƒ½è¦ä¹˜ä»¥5 ï¼ŒåŒç†1å¯¹åº”k2ï¼Œk2æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ scoreä¹˜ä»¥1            ç„¶åå…ƒç´ æŒ‰ç…§é€’å¢æ’åºï¼Œé»˜è®¤ç›¸åŒçš„å…ƒç´ score(SUM)ç›¸åŠ $redis->zUnion('ko2', array('k1', 'k2'), array(10, 2),'MAX');         // å„ä¸ªå­é›†ä¹˜ä»¥å› å­ä¹‹åï¼Œå…ƒç´ æŒ‰ç…§é€’å¢æ’åºï¼Œç›¸åŒçš„å…ƒç´ çš„scoreå–æœ€å¤§å€¼(MAX)           ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®MIN å–æœ€å°å€¼$redis->zInter('ko1', array('k1', 'k2'));         // é›†åˆk1å’Œé›†åˆk2å–äº¤é›†äºk01 ï¼Œä¸”æŒ‰ç…§scoreå€¼é€’å¢æ’åº           å¦‚æœé›†åˆå…ƒç´ ç›¸åŒï¼Œåˆ™æ–°é›†åˆä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ çš„scoreå€¼ç›¸åŠ $redis->zInter('ko1', array('k1', 'k2'), array(5, 1));         //é›†åˆk1å’Œé›†åˆk2å–äº¤é›†äºk01 ï¼Œarray(5,1)ä¸­å…ƒç´ çš„ä¸ªæ•°ä¸å­é›†åˆå¯¹åº”ï¼Œç„¶å 5 å¯¹åº”k1           k1æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ scoreéƒ½è¦ä¹˜ä»¥5 ï¼ŒåŒç†1å¯¹åº”k2ï¼Œk2æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ scoreä¹˜ä»¥1           ï¼Œç„¶åå…ƒç´ scoreæŒ‰ç…§é€’å¢æ’åºï¼Œé»˜è®¤ç›¸åŒçš„å…ƒç´ score(SUM)ç›¸åŠ $redis->zInter('ko1', array('k1', 'k2'), array(5, 1),'MAX');         // å„ä¸ªå­é›†ä¹˜ä»¥å› å­ä¹‹åï¼Œå…ƒç´ scoreæŒ‰ç…§é€’å¢æ’åºï¼Œç›¸åŒçš„å…ƒç´ scoreå–æœ€å¤§å€¼(MAX)           ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®MIN å–æœ€å°å€¼6. Hashæ•°æ®ç±»å‹redis hashæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªstringç±»å‹çš„fieldå’Œvalueçš„æ˜ å°„è¡¨.å®ƒçš„æ·»åŠ ï¼Œåˆ é™¤æ“ä½œéƒ½æ˜¯O(1)ï¼ˆå¹³å‡ï¼‰.hashç‰¹åˆ«é€‚åˆç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨å¯¹è±¡ã€‚$redis->hSet('h', 'name', 'TK'); // åœ¨hè¡¨ä¸­ æ·»åŠ nameå­—æ®µ valueä¸ºTK$redis->hSetNx('h', 'name', 'TK');         // åœ¨hè¡¨ä¸­ æ·»åŠ nameå­—æ®µ valueä¸ºTK å¦‚æœå­—æ®µnameçš„valueå­˜åœ¨è¿”å›false å¦åˆ™è¿”å› true$redis->hGet('h', 'name'); // è·å–hè¡¨ä¸­nameå­—æ®µvalue$redis->hLen('h'); // è·å–hè¡¨é•¿åº¦å³å­—æ®µçš„ä¸ªæ•°$redis->hDel('h','email'); // åˆ é™¤hè¡¨ä¸­email å­—æ®µ$redis->hKeys('h'); // è·å–hè¡¨ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰å­—æ®µ$redis->hVals('h'); // è·å–hè¡¨ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰å­—æ®µvalue$redis->hGetAll('h'); // è·å–hè¡¨ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰å­—æ®µå’Œvalue è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå…³è”æ•°ç»„(å­—æ®µä¸ºé”®å€¼)$redis->hExists('h', 'email'); //åˆ¤æ–­email å­—æ®µæ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ä¸è¡¨h ä¸å­˜åœ¨è¿”å›false$redis->hSet('h', 'age', 28);$redis->hIncrBy('h', 'age', -2);  // è®¾ç½®hè¡¨ä¸­ageå­—æ®µvalueåŠ (-2) å¦‚æœvalueæ˜¯ä¸ªéæ•°å€¼ åˆ™è¿”å›false å¦åˆ™ï¼Œè¿”å›æ“ä½œåçš„value$redis->hIncrByFloat('h', 'age', -0.33);          // è®¾ç½®hè¡¨ä¸­ageå­—æ®µvalueåŠ (-2.6) å¦‚æœvalueæ˜¯ä¸ªéæ•°å€¼ åˆ™è¿”å›false å¦åˆ™           è¿”å›æ“ä½œåçš„value(å°æ•°ç‚¹ä¿ç•™15ä½)$redis->hMset('h', array('score' => '80', 'salary' => 2000)); // è¡¨h æ‰¹é‡è®¾ç½®å­—æ®µå’Œvalue$redis->hMGet('h', array('score','salary')); // è¡¨h æ‰¹é‡è·å–å­—æ®µçš„value

posts.text: å¸¸ç”¨çš„sqlè¯­å¥ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿æŸ¥è¯¢ã€‚ ä¸€ã€ç”¨æˆ·ç®¡ç†ï¼š1ã€æ–°å»ºç”¨æˆ·ï¼š CREATE USER name IDENTIFIED BY â€˜ssapdrowâ€™; 2ã€æ›´æ”¹å¯†ç ï¼š SET PASSWORD FOR name=PASSWORD(â€˜fdddfdâ€™); 3ã€æƒé™ç®¡ç† SHOW GRANTS FOR name; //æŸ¥çœ‹nameç”¨æˆ·æƒé™ GRANT SELECT ON db_name.* TO name; //ç»™nameç”¨æˆ·db_nameæ•°æ®åº“çš„æ‰€æœ‰æƒé™ REVOKE SELECT ON db_name.* TO name; //GRANTçš„åæ“ä½œï¼Œå»é™¤æƒé™ï¼› äºŒã€æ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œï¼š1ã€æŸ¥çœ‹æ•°æ®åº“ï¼š SHOW DATABASES; 2ã€åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“ï¼š CREATE DATABASE db_name;//db_nameä¸ºæ•°æ®åº“å 3ã€ä½¿ç”¨æ•°æ®åº“ï¼š USE db_name; 4ã€åˆ é™¤æ•°æ®åº“ï¼š DROP DATABASE db_name; ä¸‰ã€åˆ›å»ºè¡¨ï¼š1ã€åˆ›å»ºè¡¨ï¼š12345CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS table_name( id INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, //idå€¼ï¼Œæ— ç¬¦å·ã€éç©ºã€é€’å¢â€”â€”å”¯ä¸€æ€§ï¼Œå¯åšä¸»é”®ã€‚ name VARCHAR(60) NOT NULLscore TINYINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, //è®¾ç½®é»˜è®¤åˆ—å€¼ PRIMARY KEY(id))ENGINE=InnoDB //è®¾ç½®è¡¨çš„å­˜å‚¨å¼•æ“ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬å¸¸ç”¨InnoDBå’ŒMyISAMï¼›InnoDBå¯é ï¼Œæ”¯æŒäº‹åŠ¡ï¼›MyISAMé«˜æ•ˆä¸æ”¯æŒå…¨æ–‡æ£€ç´¢DEFAULT charset=utf8; //è®¾ç½®é»˜è®¤çš„ç¼–ç ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­æ–‡ä¹±ç  2ã€å¤åˆ¶è¡¨ï¼š CREATE TABLE tb_name2 SELECT * FROM tb_name; æˆ–è€…éƒ¨åˆ†å¤åˆ¶ï¼š CREATE TABLE tb_name2 SELECT id,name FROM tb_name; 3ã€åˆ›å»ºä¸´æ—¶è¡¨ï¼š CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tb_name(è¿™é‡Œå’Œåˆ›å»ºæ™®é€šè¡¨ä¸€æ ·); posts.text: ``` /*  * å‘é€å¾®ä¿¡æ¨¡æ¿çŸ­ä¿¡  * $openid  å¾®ä¿¡ç”¨æˆ·openid  * $href    çŸ­ä¿¡é“¾æ¥åˆ°çš„ç½‘å€  */ function wx_send($openid, $href){     $tpl = array(         //æ¥æ”¶è€…d         "touser"=>$openid,         //è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯ä½ è¦å‘é€çš„æ¨¡æ¿ç±»å‹id         "template_id"=>"uWkFcjxKGrMLdZZM3WcFEh9Tkk_Dh2bU1SICF92n-RY",         //è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯ç‚¹å‡»æ¨¡æ¿è·³è½¬çš„é¡µé¢         "url" => $href,         //æ ‡é¢˜é¢œè‰²         "topcolor" => "#FFAE89",         "data" => array( //è¿™é‡Œçš„first,keyword éƒ½è¦å¯¹åº”è¿™æ¨¡æ¿é‡Œé¢çš„ä¿¡æ¯å†™ é¢œè‰²å¯è‡ªå®šä¹‰             "first" => array("value" => "è´­è½¦é€šçŸ¥"),             "keyword1" => array("value" => "195800å…ƒ"),             "keyword2" => array("value" => "å¥¥è¿ªA3 2017æ¬¾ Sportback 35 TFSI é£å°šå‹"),             "keyword3" => array("value" => "å—äº¬å¸‚é›¨èŠ±å°åŒº"),             "keyword4" => array("value" => "02588888888"), //è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯é€šç”¨çš„ å°±ç±»ä¼¼ä¸å¤‡æ³¨çš„å­˜åœ¨             "remark" => array("value" => "æ”¯ä»˜è´­è½¦æ¬¾åï¼Œè¯·å°½å¿«åŠç†è½¦è¾†è¿‡æˆ·æ‰‹ç»­","color" => "#FF7256"),         ),     );     $json_template = json_encode($tpl);          $url = "https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/message/template/send?access_token=".get_access_token();     $res = json_decode(http_request($url,urldecode($json_template)),true);     if ($res["errcode"] == 0){         echo "ok";     }else{         echo json_encode($res);     } } /*  * è·å–access_token  */ function get_access_token(){     $appid = z_get_config('wechat_appid');     $appsecret = z_get_config('wechat_appsecret');     $url_get='https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/token?grant_type=client_credential&appid='.$appid.'&secret='.$appsecret;     $json=z_get_json($url_get);     return $json['access_token']; } function http_request($url, $data = array()) {     $ch = curl_init();     curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);     curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);     curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, FALSE);     curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, FALSE);     // postæ•°æ®     curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);     // æŠŠpostçš„å˜é‡åŠ ä¸Š     curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);     $output = curl_exec($ch);     curl_close($ch);     return $output; } function z_get_json($url){     $ch = curl_init();     curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);     curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, FALSE);      curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, FALSE);      curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);     $output = curl_exec($ch);     curl_close($ch);     return json_decode($output, true); } ```

$item = new Uploader($imgUrl, $config, "remote");çœ‹åˆ°è¿™ä¸¤æ®µä»£ç ã€‚ç»§ç»­æ‰“å¼€ç»Ÿè®¡ç›®å½•ä¸‹Uploader.class.php//æ„é€ å‡½æ•°å¦‚ä¸‹ public function __construct($fileField, $config, $type = "upload")     {             $this->fileField = $fileField;             $this->config = $config;             $this->type = $type;         if ($type == "remote") {                     $this->saveRemote();         } else if($type == "base64") {                     $this->upBase64();         } else {                     $this->upFile();         }                 $this->stateMap['ERROR_TYPE_NOT_ALLOWED'] = iconv('unicode', 'utf-8', $this->stateMap['ERROR_TYPE_NOT_ALLOWED']);     }æœç´¢saveRemoteï¼Œä¸»è¦ä¿®å¤fileTypeä¸oriNameä¸¤å—ã€‚/**      * æ‹‰å–è¿œç¨‹å›¾ç‰‡      * @return mixed      */     private function saveRemote()     {                 $imgUrl = htmlspecialchars($this->fileField);        $imgUrl = str_replace("&amp;", "&", $imgUrl);         //httpå¼€å¤´éªŒè¯        if (strpos($imgUrl, "http") !== 0) {             $this->stateInfo = $this->getStateInfo("ERROR_HTTP_LINK");            return;        }         preg_match('/(^https*://[^:/]+)/', $imgUrl, $matches);        $host_with_protocol = count($matches) > 1 ? $matches[1] : '';         // åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯åˆæ³• url        if (!filter_var($host_with_protocol, FILTER_VALIDATE_URL)) {                        $this->stateInfo = $this->getStateInfo("INVALID_URL");            return;        }         preg_match('/^https*://(.+)/', $host_with_protocol, $matches);                $host_without_protocol = count($matches) > 1 ? $matches[1] : '';         // æ­¤æ—¶æå–å‡ºæ¥çš„å¯èƒ½æ˜¯ ip ä¹Ÿæœ‰å¯èƒ½æ˜¯åŸŸåï¼Œå…ˆè·å– ip                $ip = gethostbyname($host_without_protocol);        // åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ç§æœ‰ ip        if(!filter_var($ip, FILTER_VALIDATE_IP, FILTER_FLAG_NO_PRIV_RANGE)) {                        $this->stateInfo = $this->getStateInfo("INVALID_IP");            return;        }         //è·å–è¯·æ±‚å¤´å¹¶æ£€æµ‹æ­»é“¾                $heads = get_headers($imgUrl, 1);        if (!(stristr($heads[0], "200") && stristr($heads[0], "OK"))) {            $this->stateInfo = $this->getStateInfo("ERROR_DEAD_LINK");            return;        }        //æ ¼å¼éªŒè¯(æ‰©å±•åéªŒè¯å’ŒContent-TypeéªŒè¯)                $fileType = strtolower(strrchr($imgUrl, '.'));        //13sai 20170712  ç§€ç±³ç½‘é“¾æ¥æ¥å¦‚ä¸‹http://img.xiumi.us/xmi/ua/h4qG/i/b8f2af6986e8dba51615a9d85cc82f3b-sz_1952250.JPG?x-oss-process=style/xm ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å®Œå–„ä¸‹                $fileType = (strpos($fileType, '?') > 0)? strtolower(substr($fileType,0,strpos($fileType,'?'))) : strtolower($fileType);        //echo $fileType;die();        if (!in_array($fileType, $this->config['allowFiles']) || !isset($heads['Content-Type']) || !stristr($heads['Content-Type'], "image")) {            $this->stateInfo = $this->getStateInfo("ERROR_HTTP_CONTENTTYPE");            return;        }         //æ‰“å¼€è¾“å‡ºç¼“å†²åŒºå¹¶è·å–è¿œç¨‹å›¾ç‰‡        ob_start();        $context = stream_context_create(            array('http' => array(                'follow_location' => false // don't follow redirects            ))        );        readfile($imgUrl, false, $context);        $img = ob_get_contents();        ob_end_clean();        //13sai 20170712  æ­¤å¤„æ­£åˆ™æœ‰é—®é¢˜ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹å¦‚ä¸‹        //preg_match("//[.]?[^./]*$/", $imgUrl, $m);        preg_match("//[A-za-z0-9-]+.".$fileType."/", strtolower($imgUrl), $m);        //var_dump($m);die();         $this->oriName = $m ? ltrim($m[0],'/'):"";        //$this->oriName = $m ? $m[1]:"";        //echo $this->oriName;        //die();        $this->fileSize = strlen($img);        $this->fileType = $this->getFileExt();        $this->fullName = $this->getFullName();        $this->filePath = $this->getFilePath();        $this->fileName = $this->getFileName();        $dirname = dirname($this->filePath);         //æ£€æŸ¥æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°æ˜¯å¦è¶…å‡ºé™åˆ¶        if (!$this->checkSize()) {            $this->stateInfo = $this->getStateInfo("ERROR_SIZE_EXCEED");            return;        }         //åˆ›å»ºç›®å½•å¤±è´¥        if (!file_exists($dirname) && !mkdir($dirname, 0777, true)) {            $this->stateInfo = $this->getStateInfo("ERROR_CREATE_DIR");            return;        } else if (!is_writeable($dirname)) {            $this->stateInfo = $this->getStateInfo("ERROR_DIR_NOT_WRITEABLE");            return;        }         //ç§»åŠ¨æ–‡ä»¶        if (!(file_put_contents($this->filePath, $img) && file_exists($this->filePath))) { //ç§»åŠ¨å¤±è´¥            $this->stateInfo = $this->getStateInfo("ERROR_WRITE_CONTENT");        } else { //ç§»åŠ¨æˆåŠŸ            $this->stateInfo = $this->stateMap[0];        }     }æ‰“å¼€php/config.jsonï¼Œä¿®æ”¹å¤§å°ã€æ ¼å¼ã€å­˜å‚¨è·¯å¾„ç­‰å‚æ•°/ æŠ“å–è¿œç¨‹å›¾ç‰‡é…ç½® /    "catcherLocalDomain": ["127.0.0.1", "localhost", "img.baidu.com"],    "catcherActionName": "catchimage", / æ‰§è¡ŒæŠ“å–è¿œç¨‹å›¾ç‰‡çš„actionåç§° /    "catcherFieldName": "source", / æäº¤çš„å›¾ç‰‡åˆ—è¡¨è¡¨å•åç§° /    "catcherPathFormat": "/Upload/ueditor/image/{yyyy}{mm}{dd}/{time}{rand:6}", / ä¸Šä¼ ä¿å­˜è·¯å¾„,å¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰ä¿å­˜è·¯å¾„å’Œæ–‡ä»¶åæ ¼å¼ /    "catcherUrlPrefix": "", / å›¾ç‰‡è®¿é—®è·¯å¾„å‰ç¼€ /    "catcherMaxSize": 20480000, / ä¸Šä¼ å¤§å°é™åˆ¶ï¼Œå•ä½B /    "catcherAllowFiles": [".png", ".jpg", ".jpeg", ".gif", ".bmp"], / æŠ“å–å›¾ç‰‡æ ¼å¼æ˜¾ç¤º /5.ä¿å­˜ä¿®æ”¹ä¸Šä¼ ï¼Œæµ‹è¯•æˆåŠŸï¼

/*  * åŠŸèƒ½æè¿°:å°†æ•°ç»„æ•°æ®å†™å…¥cvsæ–‡ä»¶  *  * å‚æ•°:  * $data:éœ€è¦å†™å…¥çš„æ•°ç»„æ ¼å¼çš„æ•°æ®  * $filename:csvæ–‡ä»¶çš„åç§°,å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰ç¡®å®š,é»˜è®¤ä¸ºå½“å‰æ—¶é—´(æ ¼å¼ä¸º:YmdHis)  *  *  * */ function write_csv($data = null, $filename = null) {     if (! ($data || $filename)) {         return false;     }     $fp = fopen ( $filename , 'w' );     foreach ( $data as $fields ) {        fputcsv ( $fp, $fields );    }     fclose ( $fp );}/*  åŠŸèƒ½æè¿°:ä¸å†™å…¥cvsæ–‡ä»¶,å¹¶ä¸”è¾“å‡ºçš„åˆ°æµè§ˆå™¨   å‚æ•°:  $data:éœ€è¦å†™å…¥çš„æ•°ç»„æ ¼å¼çš„æ•°æ®  $filename:csvæ–‡ä»¶çš„åç§°,å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰ç¡®å®š,é»˜è®¤ä¸ºå½“å‰æ—¶é—´(æ ¼å¼ä¸º:YmdHis)  *  /function output_csv($data = null, $filename = null) {     if (! ($data || $filename)) {        return false;    }     header('Content-Type:application/force-download');    header("content-Disposition:attachment;filename={$filename}");     foreach ( $data as $fields ) {        foreach ($fields as $value){            echo $value.',';        }        echo "";    }}/*  åŠŸèƒ½æè¿°:è¯»å–cvsæ–‡ä»¶   å‚æ•°:  $filename:è¦è¯»å–çš„csvæ–‡ä»¶çš„åç§° * *  /function read_csv($filename=null) {    if(!$filename){        return false;    }    $handle=fopen($filename,'r');    if(!$handle){        return false;    }     echo "<meta charset='utf-8'/>";     $row=1;    while($data=fgetcsv($handle,1000,",")){        $num=count($data);        echo "<br>";        //echo "<h1>  ç¬¬ $row è¡Œ ,å…±æœ‰ $num ä¸ªå­—æ®µ <br /></h1>";        $row ++;        for ($c=0;$c<$num;$c++){            echo $data[$c]." ";        }    } }/*  åŠŸèƒ½æè¿°:è¯»å–cvsæ–‡ä»¶,è¾“å‡ºåˆ°æµè§ˆå™¨,é‡‡ç”¨file_get_contentså¤„ç†   å‚æ•°:  $filename:è¦è¯»å–çš„csvæ–‡ä»¶çš„åç§° * *  /function read_output_file_get_contents($filename=null){    if(!$filename){        return false;    }    // header('Content-Type:application/force-download');    // header("content-Disposition:filename={$filename}");     echo file_get_contents($filename);}/*  åŠŸèƒ½æè¿°:è¯»å–cvsæ–‡ä»¶,è¾“å‡ºåˆ°æµè§ˆå™¨,é‡‡ç”¨fopenå¤„ç†   å‚æ•°:  $filename:è¦è¯»å–çš„csvæ–‡ä»¶çš„åç§° * *  /function read_output_fopen($filename=null){    if(!$filename){        return false;    }     $file_handle = fopen($filename, "r");    echo "<meta charset='utf-8'/>";    while (!feof($file_handle)) {        $line = fgets($file_handle);        echo $line.'<br/>';    }    fclose($file_handle);} // output_csv($data,'ggg.xls');//output_csv($data,'ggg.csv'); // read_csv('ggg.csv'); //read_output_file_get_contents('ggg.csv'); // read_output_fopen('ggg.csv');ç®€å•æ˜äº†ï¼Œæ— éœ€å¤šè¨€ã€‚

console.log(0.3*3);      // è¾“å‡º 0.8999999999999999console.log(3*3/10);     // è¾“å‡º 0.9ä»ä»¥ä¸Šç°è±¡å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œå¹¶ä¸æ˜¯æ‰€æœ‰çš„æµ®ç‚¹æ•°è¿ç®—éƒ½ä¼šå‡ºé—®é¢˜ï¼Œåªæ˜¯éƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚0.7+0.1 è¾“å‡ºæœ‰åå·®0.6+0.2 è¾“å‡ºæ­£ç¡®å…·ä½“æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆåŸå› å‘¢ï¼Ÿè¯¯å·®åŸå› ï¼šä¸ä»…åœ¨ 0.1 æ— è®ºå¦‚ä½•ä¹Ÿä¸èƒ½ç”¨è¿™ç§å½¢å¼æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œå› æ­¤ï¼Œè®¡ç®—æœºåœ¨å­˜å‚¨å®ƒæ—¶ï¼Œäº§ç”Ÿäº†ç²¾åº¦ä¸¢å¤±ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å°±å‡ºç°äº†é—®é¢˜ä¸­æ‰€æè¿°çš„ç°è±¡ã€‚äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æµ®ç‚¹æ•°å…·ä½“çš„å‚¨å­˜ã€è¿ç®—ç»†èŠ‚ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŸ¥é˜…ç°åœ¨åº”ç”¨æœ€å¹¿çš„ IEEE 754ã€‚è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼šå¦‚ä½•è§£å†³å‘¢ï¼Ÿçœ‹è¿™ä¸ªä¾‹å­ï¼š console.log(0.3*3);      // è¾“å‡º 0.8999999999999999console.log(3*3/10);     // è¾“å‡º 0.9æµ®ç‚¹æ•°è®¡ç®—æœ‰é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ•´æ•°è®¡ç®—æ˜¯æ²¡é—®é¢˜çš„ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°†æµ®ç‚¹è½¬åŒ–æˆæ­£æ•°è¿ç®—ï¼Œä¹‹åå†åˆ‡å›æµ®ç‚¹å°±å¯ä»¥ä¿è¯æ²¡æœ‰åå·®äº†æ³¨ï¼šä¸æ¨èjsåšå¤ªå¤šçš„æµ®ç‚¹è¿ç®—ã€‚ä»¥ä¸‹æ–¹æ³•å¯ä»¥å¸®åŠ©ä½ ä¿®æ­£æµ®ç‚¹è¿ç®—çš„åå·®ï¼š// æµ®ç‚¹æ•°æ±‚å’Œfunction add(a, b) {    var c, d, e;     try {         c = a.toString().split(".")[1].length;     } catch (f) {         c = 0;     }     try {        d = b.toString().split(".")[1].length;     } catch (f) {        d = 0;     }    return e = Math.pow(10, Math.max(c, d)), (mul(a, e) + mul(b, e)) / e; }  // æµ®ç‚¹æ•°ç›¸å‡function sub(a, b) {    var c, d, e;     try {         c = a.toString().split(".")[1].length;     } catch (f) {         c = 0;     }     try {        d = b.toString().split(".")[1].length;     } catch (f) {        d = 0;     }    return e = Math.pow(10, Math.max(c, d)), (mul(a, e) - mul(b, e)) / e; }  // æµ®ç‚¹æ•°ç›¸ä¹˜function mul(a, b) {    var c = 0,        d = a.toString(),        e = b.toString();     try {         c += d.split(".")[1].length;     } catch (f) {}     try {         c += e.split(".")[1].length;     } catch (f) {}    return Number(d.replace(".", "")) * Number(e.replace(".", "")) / Math.pow(10, c); }  // æµ®ç‚¹æ•°ç›¸é™¤function div(a, b) {    var c, d, e = 0,         f = 0;     try {        e = a.toString().split(".")[1].length;     } catch (g) {}     try {         f = b.toString().split(".")[1].length;     } catch (g) {}    return c = Number(a.toString().replace(".", "")), d = Number(b.toString().replace(".", "")), mul(c / d, Math.pow(10, f - e)); }éªŒè¯ï¼šconsole.log(0.1+0.2);        // è¾“å‡º 0.30000000000000004console.log(add(0.1, 0.2));  // è¾“å‡º 0.3 console.log(0.7+0.1);        // è¾“å‡º 0.7999999999999999console.log(add(0.7, 0.1));  // è¾“å‡º 0.8 console.log(0.3*3);          // è¾“å‡º 0.8999999999999999console.log(mul(0.3, 3));    // è¾“å‡º 0.9é‡‡ç”¨ä¼˜åŒ–æ–¹æ³•åè®¡ç®—çš„ç»“æœéƒ½æ˜¯æ­£ç¡®çš„ã€‚

ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­xxxä¸ºè°ƒç”¨çš„æ¥å£åç”¨æˆ·å–æ¶ˆæ—¶ï¼š"xxx:cancel"ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­xxxä¸ºè°ƒç”¨çš„æ¥å£åè°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥æ—¶ï¼šå…¶å€¼ä¸ºå…·ä½“é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯æˆ‘ä»¬é‡ç‚¹ä»‹ç»ç”Ÿæˆè¿™äº›é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯<?phpclass JssdkAction extends AppbaseAction{    private $appId = "@";    private $appSecret = "@";         /ç»§æ‰¿çˆ¶ç±»/    protected function _initialize() {        parent::_initialize();    }     public function getSignPackage() {        $jsapiTicket = $this->getJsApiTicket();     private function createNonceStr($length = 16) {        $chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789";        $str = "";        for ($i = 0; $i < $length; $i++) {        $str .= substr($chars, mt_rand(0, strlen($chars) - 1), 1);        }        return $str;    }     private function getJsApiTicket() {        // jsapi_ticket åº”è¯¥å…¨å±€å­˜å‚¨ä¸æ›´æ–°ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç ä»¥å†™å…¥åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­åšç¤ºä¾‹        $data = json_decode(file_get_contents("jsapi_ticket.json"),true);        if ($data->expire_time < time()) {            $accessToken = $this->getAccessToken();            // å¦‚æœæ˜¯ä¼ä¸šå·ç”¨ä»¥ä¸‹ URL è·å– ticket            // $url = "https://qyapi.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/get_jsapi_ticket?access_token=$accessToken";            $url = "https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/ticket/getticket?type=jsapi&access_token=$accessToken";            $res = z_get_json($url);            $ticket = $res['ticket'];            if ($ticket) {                $data->expire_time = time() + 7200;                $data->jsapi_ticket = $ticket;                $fp = fopen("jsapi_ticket.json", "w");                fwrite($fp, json_encode($data));                fclose($fp);            }            //echo $accessToken;            //echo 1;        } else {            $ticket = $data['jsapi_ticket'];        }        //echo $ticket;        //die();        return $ticket;    }     private function getAccessToken() {    // access_token åº”è¯¥å…¨å±€å­˜å‚¨ä¸æ›´æ–°ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç ä»¥å†™å…¥åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­åšç¤ºä¾‹        $data = json_decode(file_get_contents("access_token.json"));        if ($data->expire_time < time()) {            // å¦‚æœæ˜¯ä¼ä¸šå·ç”¨ä»¥ä¸‹URLè·å–access_token            // $url = "https://qyapi.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/gettoken?corpid=$this->appId&corpsecret=$this->appSecret";            $url = "https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/token?grant_type=client_credential&appid=$this->appId&secret=$this->appSecret";            $res = z_get_json($url);            $access_token = $res['access_token'];            if ($access_token) {                $data->expire_time = time() + 7200;                $data->access_token = $access_token;                $fp = fopen("access_token.json", "w");                fwrite($fp, json_encode($data));                fclose($fp);            }            //var_dump($res);            //die();        } else {            $access_token = $data->access_token;        }                return $access_token;    } }å¦ä¸€ä¸ªç»„çš„è°ƒç”¨<?php class ActivityAction extends BaseAction {     /ç»§æ‰¿çˆ¶ç±»/    protected function _initialize() {        parent::_initialize();    } C('VAR_PAGE') : 'p' ; if(!empty($listRows)) { $this->listRows = intval($listRows); } $this->totalPages = ceil($this->totalRows/$this->listRows); //æ€»é¡µæ•° $this->coolPages = ceil($this->totalPages/$this->rollPage); } public function setConfig($name,$value) { if(isset($this->config[$name])) { $this->config[$name] = $value; } } public function show() { if(0 == $this->totalRows) return ''; $p = $this->varPage; $nowCoolPage = ceil($this->nowPage/$this->rollPage); $url = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'].(strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'],'?')?'':"?").$this->parameter; $parse = parse_url($url); if(isset($parse['query'])) { parse_str($parse['query'],$params); unset($params[$p]); $url = $parse['path'].'?'.http_build_query($params); } //ä¸Šä¸‹ç¿»é¡µå­—ç¬¦ä¸² $upRow = $this->nowPage-1; $downRow = $this->nowPage+1; if ($upRow>0){ $upPage = "<li class='prev'><a href='javascript:".$this->ajax_func."(".$upRow.")'>".$this->config['prev']."</a></li>"; }else{ $upPage = ""; } if ($downRow <= $this->totalPages){ $downPage = "<li class='next'><a href='javascript:".$this->ajax_func."(".$downRow.")'>".$this->config['next']."</a></li>"; }else{ $downPage = ""; } // << < > >> if($nowCoolPage == 1){ $theFirst = ""; $prePage = ""; }else{ $preRow = $this->nowPage-$this->rollPage; $prePage = "<li><a href='javascript:".$this->ajax_func."(".$preRow.")'>ä¸Š".$this->rollPage."é¡µ</a></li>"; $theFirst = "<li><a href='javascript:".$this->ajax_func."(1)' >".$this->config['first']."</a></li>"; } if($nowCoolPage == $this->coolPages){ $nextPage = ""; $theEnd=""; }else{ $nextRow = $this->nowPage+$this->rollPage; $theEndRow = $this->totalPages; $nextPage = "<li><a href='javascript:".$this->ajax_func."(".$nextRow.")' >ä¸‹".$this->rollPage."é¡µ</a></li>"; $theEnd = "<li><a href='javascript:".$this->ajax_func."(".$theEndRow.")' >".$this->config['last']."</a></li>"; } // 1 2 3 4 5 $linkPage = ""; for($i=1;$i<=$this->rollPage;$i++){ $page=($nowCoolPage-1)*$this->rollPage+$i; if($page!=$this->nowPage){ if($page<=$this->totalPages){ $linkPage .= "<li><a href='javascript:".$this->ajax_func."(".$page.")'>&nbsp;".$page."&nbsp;</a></li>"; }else{ break; } }else{ if($this->totalPages != 1){ $linkPage .= "<li><span class='current'>".$page."</span></li>"; } } } $pageStr = str_replace( array('%header%','%nowPage%','%totalRow%','%totalPage%','%upPage%','%downPage%','%first%','%prePage%','%linkPage%','%nextPage%','%end%'), array($this->config['header'],$this->nowPage,$this->totalRows,$this->totalPages,$upPage,$downPage,$theFirst,$prePage,$linkPage,$nextPage,$theEnd),$this->config['theme']); return $pageStr; }} IndexAction1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435public function new(){ import("ORG.Util.ajaxPage");// å¯¼å…¥åˆ†é¡µç±» æ³¨æ„å¯¼å…¥çš„æ˜¯è‡ªå·±å†™çš„AjaxPageç±» $m = M('vw_article'); $count = $m->count(); //è®¡ç®—è®°å½•æ•° $limitRows = 5; // è®¾ç½®æ¯é¡µè®°å½•æ•° //ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•°æ˜¯ä½ éœ€è¦è°ƒç”¨æ¢é¡µçš„ajaxå‡½æ•°å $p = new AjaxPage($count, $limitRows,"ajaxpage"); $limit = $p->firstRow . "," . $p->listRows; $p->setConfig('theme','<ul class="pagination"> %first% %prePage% %upPage% %linkPage% %downPage% %nextPage% %end% </ul>'); $data = $m->limit($limit)->select(); // æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ® $page = $p->show(); // äº§ç”Ÿåˆ†é¡µä¿¡æ¯ï¼ŒAJAXçš„è¿æ¥åœ¨æ­¤å¤„ç”Ÿæˆ $this->assign('list',$data); $this->assign('page',$page); $this->display();}public function newslist(){ $p = I('p'); import("ORG.Util.ajaxPage"); $m = M('vw_article'); $count = $m->count(); //è®¡ç®—è®°å½•æ•° $limitRows = 5; // è®¾ç½®æ¯é¡µè®°å½•æ•° $p = new AjaxPage($count, $limitRows,"ajaxpage"); //ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•°æ˜¯ä½ éœ€è¦è°ƒç”¨æ¢é¡µçš„ajaxå‡½æ•°å $limit = $p->firstRow . "," . $p->listRows; $p->setConfig('theme','<ul class="pagination"> %first% %prePage% %upPage% %linkPage% %downPage% %nextPage% %end% </ul>'); $data = $m->limit($limit)->select(); // æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ® $page = $p->show(); // äº§ç”Ÿåˆ†é¡µä¿¡æ¯ï¼ŒAJAXçš„è¿æ¥åœ¨æ­¤å¤„ç”Ÿæˆ $this->assign('list',$data); $this->assign('page',$page); $this->display(); } tpl123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536<div class="page row"> <include file="./sidebar" /> <div class="page-right" id="ajaxPage"> <div class="page-position"> <a href="{:U('Home/Index/index')}">é¦–é¡µ</a>>>{$navname} </div> <div class="page-list"> <ul> <volist name="list" id="vo"> <li> <div class="desc" > <h3><a href="{:U('Home/Index/news',array('art_id'=>$vo['art_id'],'art_column'=>$vo['art_column']))}"><span class="wd-fr">{$vo['art_post_time']}</span>{:mb_substr($vo['art_name'],0,40,'utf-8')}</a></h3> </div> </li> </volist> </ul> </div> <div class="wdphp-page"> {$page} </div> </div></div><script type="text/javascript"> function ajaxpage(id){ var id = id; //postå¯ä¸è¡Œ $.ajax({ url: "{:U('Home/Index/userlist')}", data: {'p':id}, success: function (html) { $("#ajaxPage").html(html); } }); } </script> å¥½äº†ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯è¿˜è›®é¡ºæ‰‹ã€‚ ä½†æ˜¯å¦‚æœæ—¶å€™é‚£ç§ä¸‹æ»‘æ— åˆ·æ–°çš„å‘¢ï¼Œæ€ä¹ˆåšï¼ŸåŠ js?

    //OAthu2.0 å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°    public function oauthCallback(){        $appid = $this->appid;        $secret = $this->secret;        $code = $GET["code"];                //å–å¾—openid ,access_token        $oauth2Url = "https://api.weixin.qq.com/sns/oauth2/access_token?appid=$appid&secret=$secret&code=$code&grant_type=authorization_code";        $oauth2 = z_get_json($oauth2Url);                  //æ ¹æ®å…¨å±€access_tokenå’ŒopenidæŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯          $access_token = $oauth2["access_token"];          $openid = $oauth2['openid'];         //echo $openid;         $get_user_info_url = "https://api.weixin.qq.com/sns/userinfo?access_token=$access_token&openid=$openid&lang=zh_CN";          $userinfo = z_get_json($get_user_info_url);        //dump($userinfo);die();        //åˆ¤æ–­æ³¨å†Œè¿˜æ˜¯ç™»å½•        if($userinfo['openid']!=''){            $row = M("member")->where("m_weixin_unionid='%s'",$userinfo["unionid"])->find();            if($row){                session('m_id',$row['m_id']);                session('m_nick_name',$row['m_nick_name']);                session('m_login_name',$row['m_login_name']);                //U('Home/Home/index',null,true,true);                echo '<script>window.close();window.opener.location.href="/";</script>';            }else{                // åˆ›å»ºæ–°ç”¨æˆ·                $count = M("member")->max('m_id');                $count++;                $rand = mt_rand(1000,9999);                                $data['m_sex']  = $userinfo['sex'];                 $data['m_avatar']  = $userinfo['headimgurl'];                 $data['m_nick_name']  = mb_substr($userinfo['nickname'],0,6,"utf-8") . $count;                $data['m_login_name'] = 'wx'.$rand.''.$count;                $data['m_password'] = md5(md5(time()));                $data['m_weixin_unionid']  = $userinfo["unionid"];                 $data['from'] = 'weixin';                echo '<script>window.close();window.opener.location.href="'.U('Member/Index/oauthBind').'";</script>';                            }                    }else{            echo $str;        }    }}å…¶ä¸­çš„z_get_jsonæ–¹æ³•å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼šfunction z_get_json($url){    $ch = curl_init();    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);    curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, FALSE);     curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, FALSE);     curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);    $output = curl_exec($ch);    curl_close($ch);    return json_decode($output, true);}å‰å°ï¼š<a href="{:U('Member/Wechat/oauthLogin')}"><img src="/webui/home/images/weixin.png"></a></p>æ•ˆæœï¼š

posts.text: é¦–å…ˆéœ€è¦å»qqï¼Œweiboç”³è¯·å¯†é’¥ï¼Œç„¶åä¼šå¾—åˆ°APPIDå’ŒAPPKEYï¼Œç„¶åä¸€æ­¥æ­¥æ“ä½œï¼Œéƒ½æœ‰æç¤ºã€‚æˆåŠŸåæŠŠé…ç½®å†™åœ¨commonå‡½æ•°ä»¥ä¾¿åæœŸè°ƒç”¨ã€‚<?php //qqä¸€é”®ç™»å½• function qqlogin_config(){    define("QQDEBUG", false);    if (defined("QQDEBUG") && QQDEBUG)    {        @ini_set("error_reporting", E_ALL);        @ini_set("display_errors", TRUE);    }else{     error_reporting(E_ALL^E_NOTICE);    }     session_start();     curl_close($ch);    return $ret;}    /â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”-    å¾®åšä¸€é”®ç™»å½•  â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”-/ /**  å¾®åšä¸€é”®ç™»å½• - é…ç½® /function weibo_config(){    define( "WB_AKEY" , '4002186908' );    define( "WB_SKEY" , 'dd81902ee3460eba972f46487aac41e2' );    define( "WB_CALLBACK_URL" , 'http://www.ayanglao.org.cn'  . U('Home/OAuth/weiboCallback'));}ç„¶åå°±æ˜¯OAuthAction<?php class OAuthAction extends AppbaseAction { public&nbsp;function&nbsp;qqLogin(){         //â€¦.        qqlogin_config();         $_SESSION['state'] = md5(uniqid(rand(), TRUE)); //CSRF protection        $login_url = "https://graph.qq.com/oauth2.0/authorize?response_type=code&client_id="             . $_SESSION["appid"] . "&redirect_uri=" . urlencode($_SESSION["callback"])            . "&state=" . $_SESSION['state']            . "&scope=".$_SESSION["scope"];     //echo $login_url;     //print_r($_SESSION);     //die();        header("Location:$login_url");            }     public function qqCallback(){         qqlogin_config(); //var_dump($_SESSION);         /*         è·å–token        /        if($_REQUEST['state'] == $_SESSION['state']) //csrf        {            $token_url = "https://graph.qq.com/oauth2.0/token?grant_type=authorization_code&"                . "client_id=" . $_SESSION["appid"]. "&redirect_uri=" . urlencode($_SESSION["callback"])                . "&client_secret=" . $_SESSION["appkey"]. "&code=" . $_REQUEST["code"];            $response = file_get_contents($token_url);            if (strpos($response, "callback") !== false)            {                $lpos = strpos($response, "(");                $rpos = strrpos($response, ")");                $response  = substr($response, $lpos + 1, $rpos - $lpos -1);                $msg = json_decode($response);                if (isset($msg->error))                {                    echo "<h3>error-token:</h3>" . $msg->error;                    echo "<h3>msg  :</h3>" . $msg->error_description;                    exit;                }            }             $params = array();            parse_str($response, $params);         $str  = file_get_contents($graph_url);        if (strpos($str, "callback") !== false)        {            $lpos = strpos($str, "(");            $rpos = strrpos($str, ")");            $str  = substr($str, $lpos + 1, $rpos - $lpos -1);        }         $user = json_decode($str);        if (isset($user->error))        {            echo "<h3>error-openid:</h3>" . $user->error;            echo "<h3>msg  :</h3>" . $user->error_description;            exit;        }         //debug        //echo("Hello " . $user->openid);      $row = M("member")->where("m_qq_openid='%s'",$SESSION["openid"])->find();     if($row){     session('m_id',$row['m_id']);     session('m_nick_name',$row['m_nick_name']);     session('m_login_name',$row['m_login_name']);     }else{         echo '<script>window.close();window.opener.location.href="http://www.13sai.com'.U('Home/Guide/binding').'";</script>&#39;;     }          //echo '<script>window.close();window.opener.location.href="http://www.13sai.com";</script>&#39;;     }            }else{         echo '111'.$str;        }     }         //å¾®åšä¸€é”®ç™»å½•ï¼ˆç™»å½•ï¼‰    public function weiboLogin(){        session_start();        weibo_config();        Vendor('Weibo.saetv2ex');                 $o = new SaeTOAuthV2( WB_AKEY , WB_SKEY );         if (isset($_REQUEST['code'])) {         $keys = array();         $keys['code'] = $_REQUEST['code'];         $keys['redirect_uri'] = WB_CALLBACK_URL;         try {         $token = $o->getAccessToken( 'code', $keys ) ;         } catch (OAuthException $e) {         }        }         if ($token) {         $SESSION['token'] = $token;         setcookie( 'weibojs'.$o->client_id, http_build_query($token) );                 $c = new SaeTClientV2( WB_AKEY , WB_SKEY , $_SESSION['token']['access_token'] );         $ms  = $c->home_timeline(); // done         $uid_get = $c->get_uid();         $uid = $uid_get['uid'];         $user_message = $c->show_user_by_id( $uid);//æ ¹æ®IDè·å–ç”¨æˆ·ç­‰åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯                 //ä¿å­˜å‡ ä¸ªåŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯         $openid = $user_message['id'];         $nickname = $user_message['screen_name'];         $avatar = $user_message['profile_image_url'];         $gender = $user_message['gender'];         $gender = ($gender=='m')?'ç”·':'å¥³';          /ä»¥ä¸‹ä¸ºå†™æœ¬åœ°æ•°æ®åº“/                 //é€šè¿‡ $openid æ£€æŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨         //if(å­˜åœ¨){             //         //}else{         // åˆ›å»ºæ–°ç”¨æˆ·         // è®¾ç½®ç™»å½•çŠ¶æ€         //}         //dump($user_message);          $row = M("member")->where("m_weibo_openid='%s'",$openid)->find();     if($row){     session('m_id',$row['m_id']);     session('m_nick_name',$row['m_nick_name']);     session('m_login_name',$row['m_login_name']);     session('is_org',-1);     //U('Home/Home/index',null,true,true);     if(session('shebei') == 1){         echo '<script>window.close();window.opener.location.href="http://www.13sai.com'.U('Wap/Home/index').'";</script>&#39;;
